default.$description: Dark color for text and UI elements

none.$description: No blur for crisp, sharp edges on elements that require maximum clarity

xs.$description: Extra small blur for ultra-subtle softening on fine details, icons, or delicate layered elements

sm.$description: Small blur for gentle softening on subtle UI elements like tooltips or small overlays

md.$description: Medium blur for balanced softness on shadows, card surfaces, or background elements

lg.$description: Large blur for visible softening on modal backdrops, dropdown menus, or layered components

xl.$description: Extra large blur for strong softness on glass morphism effects, heavy overlays, or dramatic depth

xs.$description: Extra small displays, usually phones in portrait mode

sm.$description: Small displays, usually tablets in portrait mode or large phones in landscape mode

md.$description: Medium displays, usually tablets in landscape mode

lg.$description: Displays with HD min resolution (1280x720), usually small laptops or large tablets in landscape mode

xl.$description: Displays with FHD (Full HD) min resolution (1920x1080)

2xl.$description: Displays with QHD (Quad HD) min resolution (2560x1440)

button.$description: Cursor for buttons and other clickable button elements

checkbox.$description: Cursor for checkbox and checkbox card components

disabled.$description: Cursor for disabled interactive elements to indicate they are not clickable

link.$description: Cursor for link elements that navigate to another page or location

menu-item.$description: Cursor for menu item and menu option items in dropdown and context menus

radio.$description: Cursor for radio button and radio card components

slider-thumb.$description: Cursor for slider thumb when hovering, indicating it can be grabbed and dragged

slider-thumb-active.$description: Cursor for slider thumb when actively being dragged

fastest.$description: Fastest speed for instant feedback and micro-interactions

faster.$description: Faster speed for quick transitions and hover effects

fast.$description: Fast speed for snappy transitions on interactive elements

normal.$description: Normal (default) speed for standard transitions and animations

slow.$description: Slow speed for more noticeable transitions and emphasis

slower.$description: Slower speed for deliberate transitions and prominent animations

slowest.$description: Slowest speed for very deliberate transitions and dramatic effects

hide.$description: Z-index for elements that should be hidden behind other content

base.$description: Default z-index for normal content and base layer elements

docked.$description: Z-index for fixed or docked elements like sidebars, headers, or navigation bars

dropdown.$description: Z-index for dropdown menus and select components

sticky.$description: Z-index for sticky positioned elements that need to stay visible while scrolling

banner.$description: Z-index for banner notifications and alert bars

overlay.$description: Z-index for overlay backgrounds and backdrop elements

modal.$description: Z-index for modal dialogs and dialog overlays

popover.$description: Z-index for popover components and floating content panels

skipLink.$description: Z-index for skip navigation links, ensuring accessibility links appear above all content

toast.$description: Z-index for toast notifications and temporary message displays

tooltip.$description: Z-index for tooltip components, ensuring they appear above all other UI elements
